smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class SettingsActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class SettingsViewModel is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class LockView is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function setupWindow appears to be too complex.
The function observePreferenceClicks appears to be too complex.
The function startup appears to be too complex.
The function setupPassword appears to be too complex.
The function prepareSendFeedback appears to be too complex.
The function onClick appears to be too complex.
The function onBillingInitialized appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.
The function performFiltering appears to be too complex.
The function setup appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'SettingsActivity' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'LockSetupFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'DonateActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'LockView' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
File 'Util.kt' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function prepareSendFeedback is nested too deeply.
Function performFiltering is nested too deeply.
Function sendQueryRequest is nested too deeply.

smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: ReturnFromFinally
smells.description: Do not return within a finally statement. This can discard exceptions.

instances.message: Do not return within a finally statement. This can discard exceptions.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.
RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

activity cannot be safely cast to AppCompatActivity.
v cannot be safely cast to ToggleButton.

(if (requestPkgInfo != null) pm.getApplicationLabel(requestPkgInfo) else "(unknown)") cannot be safely cast to String.
(context as ContextThemeWrapper).baseContext cannot be safely cast to AppCompatActivity.
activity cannot be safely cast to AuthenticationSucceededListener.
it.parent cannot be safely cast to ViewManager.
c.getSystemService(Context.ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AccessibilityManager.
param.args[0] cannot be safely cast to Context.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig' is unused.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of LockSetupFragment.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (this / 2 * 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this / 2 * 2

Parentheses in (
                                if (password.matches("[0-9]+".toRegex())) PREF_VALUE_PASS_PIN else PREF_VALUE_PASSWORD) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: if (password.matches("[0-9]+".toRegex())) PREF_VALUE_PASS_PIN else PREF_VALUE_PASSWORD

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private function childAtPosition is unused.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `R.id.first_start_app_package to R.string.fs_app_package_installer`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `R.id.first_start_app_settings to R.string.fs_app_settings`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `R.id.first_start_app_xposed to R.string.fs_app_xposed_installer`

smells.name: ReturnCount

smells.name: WildcardImport
